sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import Types from "./Types" export default function PokeView(props) { let mon = props.pokemon return (

{mon.name}

HP: {mon.hp}

Attack: {mon.attack}

Defense: {mon.defense}

Special Attack: {mon.special_attack}

Special Defense: {mon.special_defense}

Speed: {mon.speed}

BST: {`${mon.hp + mon.attack + mon.defense + mon.special_attack + mon.special_defense + mon.speed}`}

) }
